sentences.en: A hermit, he wears a camel - hair tunic beneath a dark - green mantle.
sentences.cn: 隐士, 他身穿一件骆驼毛外衣下面暗绿色地幔.

sentences.en: Every day the silent hermit plants 100 acorns.
sentences.cn: 沉默的隐士每天种100粒橡子.

sentences.en: He became a hermit after he was dismissed from office.
He introduced himself as Tim the hermit.
sentences.cn: 他自我介绍说自己叫隐士蒂姆.

sentences.en: I forget if it was four or five days before we sighted the hermit's little kingdom.
sentences.cn: 我记不得是过了4天还是5天才眺见这位隐士的小小王国.

sentences.en: I've spent the past ten years living like a hermit.
sentences.cn: 我过去10年里过着隐士般的生活。

sentences.en: Long ago, an old, old hermit lived deep in the woods.
sentences.cn: 很久以前, 密林深处住着一位很老很老的隐者.

sentences.en: Research has revealed him to be [ that he was ] a hermit.
sentences.cn: 调查结果表明他原是一位隐士.

sentences.en: The condition or way of life of a hermit.
sentences.cn: 隐士生活隐士状态或隐士生活方式.

sentences.en: The hermit abided in the village.
The hermit followed an ascetic life - style.
sentences.cn: 这个隐士过的是苦行生活.

sentences.en: The Hermit is a card of introspection , analysis and , well , virginity.
sentences.cn: 隐者是一张关于自省 、 分析和贞节的牌.

sentences.en: The hermit is the Buddha inside of you.
sentences.cn: 这个隐修者就是你内心深处的佛.

sentences.en: The hermit used to live in seclusion on this mountain.
sentences.cn: 那位高士曾经居此山中.

sentences.en: The teacher told us that at thethe mountain there lived a hermit.
sentences.cn: 老师告诉我们,在山顶住着一位隐修者.

sentences.en: You'd have to do that if you was a hermit. "
